title: Vehicle Fleet Management
description: Object-oriented Java application for complete vehicle fleet management: customer management, sales and rental operations, advanced search, and data persistence through JSON serialization/deserialization. Designed to be extensible and testable (MVC architecture).

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Portfolio website developed in React and Tailwind, integrating Framer Motion animations and performance-oriented UX. Showcasing projects, interactive CV, and smooth navigation system tailored for recruiters and technical demonstrations.
tags: React, Tailwind, Framer Motion, UI/UX, Frontend

title: CPU Instruction Visualizer
description: Educational C++ project enabling visualization of x86_64 assembly instruction execution on a simulated CPU: display of registers, memory, and execution flow step-by-step. Designed for learning and debugging low-level programs.

title: IoT Measurement and Detection System
description: Internship project integrating ESP32, Raspberry Pi, and ESP32-CAM for data collection (VEML7700 brightness, ACS712 current, presence detection via PIR and YOLOv8 sensors). Architecture: embedded acquisition, HTTP transmission to Flask server, MariaDB storage, and Grafana visualization. Focus on reliability and AI performance comparison.
tags: IoT, YOLOv8, ESP32, Raspberry Pi, Flask, Grafana, MariaDB, VEML7700, ACS712

title: Penetration Testing & Security Audit (Kali Linux)
description: Infrastructure and application audit project based on Kali Linux: passive/active reconnaissance, enumeration, controlled exploitation, post-exploitation, and comprehensive technical report writing (vulnerabilities, proofs, recommendations, and remediation plan). Deliverables: checklists, ST0 reports/privilege escalation reproduced, and remediation playbook.
tags: Kali Linux, Pentesting, Nmap, Metasploit, Burp Suite, OWASP, Security Report

title: Local Server Monitoring
description: Local supervision solution for servers: collecting CPU/memory/network metrics, Flask web interface, basic alerting, and visualization. Designed to diagnose and automate preventive actions on Linux environments.

title: Compiler / Assembler
description: Educational compiler translating an imperative language inspired by Pascal into x86_64 assembly. Handles FOR loops, label generation, conditional jumps, and produces optimized code.
tags: Compiler, Assembly, x86_64, C, Arithmetic Operations

title: Secure ChatApp
description: Secure messaging application developed in Python with Kivy, integrating message encryption and a simple, fluid interface.

title: Connect Four Game
description: Complete Connect Four game implementation in C++: game engine, state management, opponent AI (Minimax algorithm with pruning), and fine memory management. Optimized for robustness and algorithmic efficiency.

title: Entreps - Business Simulation
description: Educational business creation and management simulation integrating economic mechanisms (cash flow, production, marketing strategy), SWOT analysis, and experimentation with management strategies.

title: Algorithm Implementation in Julia
description: Implementation of algorithmic and optimization algorithms in Julia: traveling salesman, partitioning, and early experiments in machine learning on small datasets. Focused on performance and code clarity.

title: Data Center Design (Tier 2)
description: Engineering project for designing a Tier 2 data center: energy sizing, cooling systems, network topology, and N+1 redundancy strategy. Deliverables: diagrams, load calculations, and recommendations for availability and maintenance.
tags: Project Management, Infrastructure, Networking, Energy Management, Redundancy

title: Digit Detection by AI
description: Development of a convolutional neural network (CNN) for digit recognition on images: data collection and augmentation, supervised training, evaluation (precision/recall), and lightweight deployment for inference testing.

title: Intelligent Chatbot (In Progress)
description: Conversational agent built in Python combining NLP and machine learning techniques: preprocessing pipeline, language model training for intent classification, and dialogue module integration. Goal: simple and extensible contextual assistant.

title: Agricultural Yield Prediction
description: Predictive model for crop yield developed from meteorological and pedological data: feature engineering, model testing (regression, trees, ensemble models), and cross-validation. Deliverables: reproducible pipeline and analysis notebook.
tags: Data Science, Python, AI, Agriculture, Modeling
